cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's migi

sentence.kanji: 右のポケットにハンカチが入っています。
sentence.romaji: migi no poketo ni hankachi ga haite imasu
sentence.english: There's a handkerchief in my right pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiru

sentence.kanji: この紙を半分に切ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono kami wo hanbun ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please cut this paper in half.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugu

sentence.kanji: 直ぐ行きます。
sentence.romaji: sugu ikimasu
sentence.english: I'll go right away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naoru

sentence.kanji: クーラーはまだ直りません。
sentence.romaji: ku-ra- ha mada naorimasen
sentence.english: The air conditioner hasn't been repaired yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hidari

sentence.kanji: そこを左に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: soko wo hidari ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn left there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's betsu

sentence.kanji: 別の本も見せてください。
sentence.romaji: betsu no hon mo misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me another book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aru

sentence.kanji: 私の机の上に書類がたくさん有ります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no tsukue no ue ni shorui ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of documents on my desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ka

sentence.kanji: このアルバイトは「学生可」ですね。
sentence.romaji: kono arubaito ha gakusei ka desu ne
sentence.english: So, students can apply for this part-time job, right?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kireru

sentence.kanji: このはさみはよく切れますね。
sentence.romaji: kono hasami ha yoku kiremasu ne
sentence.english: These scissors cut well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mannaka

sentence.kanji: 道の真ん中に人が立っている。
sentence.romaji: michi no mannaka ni hito ga tate iru
sentence.english: Someone is standing in the middle of the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mashiro

sentence.kanji: 外は雪で真っ白だった。
sentence.romaji: soto ha yuki de mashiro data
sentence.english: Everything outside was white with snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naosu

sentence.kanji: 私がそれを直しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga sore wo naoshimashita
sentence.english: I mended it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masugu

sentence.kanji: この道を真っ直ぐ行ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono michi wo masugu ite kudasai
sentence.english: Please go straight along this road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's betsubetsu

sentence.kanji: 別々に払いましょう。
sentence.romaji: betsubetsu ni haraimashou
sentence.english: Let's get separate checks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakareru

sentence.kanji: 駅で友だちと別れました。
sentence.romaji: eki de tomodachi to wakaremashita
sentence.english: I parted with my friend at the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machi

sentence.kanji: あの町は緑を増やしています。
sentence.romaji: ano machi ha midori wo fuyashite imasu
sentence.english: That town is increasing its greenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arinomama

sentence.kanji: 有りのままを話して下さい。
sentence.romaji: arinomama wo hanashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell it as it is.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitamachi

sentence.kanji: あの子は下町育ちだ。
sentence.romaji: ano ko ha shitamachi sodachi da
sentence.english: That kid was raised in the old part of town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yarinaoshi

sentence.kanji: 仕事がやり直しになった。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ga yarinaoshi ni nata
sentence.english: My work had to be re-done.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yarinaosu

sentence.kanji: 急いでやり直します。
sentence.romaji: isoi de yarinaoshimasu。
sentence.english: I'll re-do it immediately.

cards.english: reconsider, change one's opinion for the better
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minaosu

sentence.kanji: 彼のことを見直しました。
sentence.romaji: kare no koto wo minaoshimashita
sentence.english: I changed my opinion of him.

cards.english: the downtown area, the central area of a town
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machinaka

sentence.kanji: 町中で彼女に出会ったよ。
sentence.romaji: machinaka de kanojo ni deata yo
sentence.english: I met her downtown.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's betsuni

sentence.kanji: 私は別に気になりません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha betsuni ki ni narimasen
sentence.english: I'm not especially anxious.

cards.english: not at all, not one bit
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isai

sentence.kanji: 私は一切その問題とは関係がありません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha isai sono mondai to ha kankei ga arimasen
sentence.english: I have absolutely nothing to do with that issue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuusuru

sentence.kanji: 資格を有する人のみ応募できます。
sentence.romaji: shikaku wo yuusuru hito nomi oubo dekimasu
sentence.english: Only qualified individuals may apply.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's midasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は風紀を乱している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fuuki wo midashite iru
sentence.english: He's corrupting public morals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sayuu

sentence.kanji: 左右を見てから横断歩道を渡りなさい。
sentence.romaji: sayuu wo mitekara oudan hodou wo watarinasai
sentence.english: Look left and right before crossing the pedestrian crossing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tadachini

sentence.kanji: 直ちに会社に戻ってください。
sentence.romaji: tadachini kaisha ni modote kudasai
sentence.english: Please return to the office at once.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koumoku

sentence.kanji: 論文の項目を分かりやすく整理したわ。
sentence.romaji: ronbun no koumoku wo wakariyasuku seiri shita wa
sentence.english: I arranged the items of the thesis in an approachable manner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakare

sentence.kanji: 別れはいつでも悲しいものです。
sentence.romaji: wakare ha itsudemo kanashii mono desu
sentence.english: Parting is always sad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manmaru

sentence.kanji: 今日は月が真ん丸です。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha tsuki ga manmaru desu
sentence.english: The moon is perfectly round today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katana

sentence.kanji: 日本映画で刀を見た。
sentence.romaji: nihon eiga de katana wo mita
sentence.english: I saw a sword in a Japanese movie.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's midareru

sentence.kanji: 風で髪が乱れたね。
sentence.romaji: kaze de kami ga midareta ne
sentence.english: The wind has messed up your hair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kire

sentence.kanji: この包丁は切れが良いな。
sentence.romaji: kono houchou ha kire ga ii na
sentence.english: This kitchen knife cuts well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinagire

sentence.kanji: 牛乳は品切れだったよ。
sentence.romaji: gyuunyuu ha shinagire data yo
sentence.english: Milk was sold out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itadaku

sentence.kanji: お客様にお菓子を頂いた。
sentence.romaji: okyakusama ni okashi wo itadaita
sentence.english: A customer gave me some snacks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choujou

sentence.kanji: あと少しで山の頂上です。
sentence.romaji: ato sukoshi de yama no choujou desu
sentence.english: The top of the mountain is not far from here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meshiagaru

sentence.kanji: どうぞ召し上がってください。
sentence.romaji: douzo meshiagate kudasai
sentence.english: Please begin eating.
